_instructions: Copy this file to .fractary/plugins/work/config.json and customize for your project

project._comment_issue_system: Primary work tracking system: github, jira, or linear

work-tracker._comment_active: Active handler: github, jira, or linear

github._comment_api_url: GitHub API endpoint (change for GitHub Enterprise)

classification._comment: Map GitHub labels to FABER work types (/feature, /bug, /chore, /patch)

states._comment: GitHub only has OPEN/CLOSED. Use labels for intermediate states.

labels._comment: FABER applies these labels during workflow phases

jira._comment_project_key: Jira project key (e.g., PROJ for PROJ-123)

issue_types._comment: Map FABER work types to Jira issue types

classification._comment: Map Jira issue types/labels to FABER work types

states._comment: Map FABER universal states to Jira workflow states

transitions._comment: Jira transition names for state changes

custom_fields._comment_work_id: Custom field ID for storing FABER work_id
custom_fields._comment: Find field IDs via Jira API or admin settings

linear._comment_team_id: Linear team UUID (primary team for issues)
linear._comment_team_key: Team key prefix (e.g., TEAM for TEAM-123)

classification._comment: Map Linear labels to FABER work types

states._comment: Map FABER universal states to Linear workflow states

custom_fields._comment: Prefix for FABER-managed labels storing work_id

defaults._comment_auto_assign: Automatically assign issue to workflow executor
defaults._comment_auto_label: Automatically apply FABER labels during workflow
defaults._comment_close_on_merge: Automatically close issue when PR merges
defaults._comment_comment_on_state_change: Post comment when issue state changes
defaults._comment_link_pr_to_issue: Reference issue number in PR description

hooks._comment: Hook configuration for auto-comment on session stop

auto_comment._comment_enabled: Enable auto-comment on session stop (default: true)
auto_comment._comment_throttle: Minimum minutes between auto-comments (0 = no throttle)
auto_comment._comment_async: Queue comments for background posting (faster hook completion)
auto_comment._comment_detailed: Enable detailed code analysis in summaries (slower but richer content)

retry._comment: Retry failed API operations with exponential backoff

caching._comment: Cache issue data to reduce API calls (experimental)

_setup_instructions.step_2: Set 'handlers.work-tracker.active' to your platform (github, jira, linear)
_setup_instructions.step_4: Set environment variables for authentication (see environment sections)
_setup_instructions.step_6: Test connection: Create test issue or fetch existing issue

_environment_variables.note: Set these in your shell profile (~/.bashrc, ~/.zshrc) or CI/CD secrets

_migration_from_v1.note: If migrating from work plugin v1.x, major changes:
_migration_from_v1.change_1: JSON protocol instead of string-based (work-manager now uses JSON)
_migration_from_v1.change_2: Close operation actually works (v1.x only posted comment)
